title: Rav Moshe Shternbuch's Emotional Plea
body: Thousands of yeshiva students protest outside Prison 10, with Rav Moshe Shternbuch denouncing authorities and breaking down in tears during a special broadcast.

title: Yeshiva Student Arrested at Police
body: Rabbi Yaakov Yisroel Gil, a talmid at Yeshivas Nachlas Shlomo, was arrested after attempting to file a complaint at a police station, sparking outrage among chareidi figures who say it's a severe blow to community trust in law enforcement.
